The given code chunk is part of the initialization process for a Joybox controller class, where essential components such as mode management, button event registration, and UI elements are set up.

# Text object to display current mode
        self.readout = OnscreenText.OnscreenText(
            pos = (-0.9, 0.95),
            font = base.direct.font,
            mayChange = 1)
        # List of functions to cycle through
        self.modeList = [self.joeMode, self.driveMode, self.orbitMode]
        # Pick initial mode
        self.updateFunc = self.joyboxFly
        self.modeName = 'Joe Mode'
        # Auxiliary data
        self.auxData = []
        # Button registry
        self.addButtonEvents()
        # Spawn update task
        self.enable()
